alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gwinnett; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Rockdale, southeastern DeKalb, south central Gwinnett and west central Walton Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Snellville to Belvedere Park, and moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Snellville, Stone Mountain, Avondale Estates, Lithonia, Walnut Grove, Pine Lake, Lakeview Estates, Belvedere Park, Candler-Mcafee, Mountain Park, Milstead, Belmont, Youth, Arabia Mountain, Big Haynes Creek Park, Redan, Rosebud, Panola Mountain State Park and Snapfinger. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
